creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: silimar to 2004.67.370; red, green, blue, yellow and white metal; royal blue satin base completely covered with appliqued scroll designs using small curly braid on red; both metals outline the designs; crown-like, stiff-shape in front; back tapers to a point; sitff overall; quilted lining; a few metal sequins on top
title: Child's Hat
